name: seatchartjs
description: A framework to create beautiful designed seat maps, legends and shopping carts.

scripts.docs:api: jsdoc2md --global-index-format none --helper docs/tools/helpers.js --partial docs/tools/header.hbs --partial docs/tools/member-index.hbs --partial docs/tools/body.hbs --files src/js/*.js > docs/api.md
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && npm run docs:api && gitbook build && npm run docs:examples && cp docs/CNAME _book
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs:prepare && npm run docs:api && gitbook serve
scripts.docs:deploy: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && gh-pages --dist _book

author: Omar Mahili
